briefdescription.para: Constructor for new QgsLayoutAtlas.
Called when rendering begins, before iteration commences.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns true if successful, false if no iteration is available or required.
endRender()

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of features to iterate over.
Returns the coverage layer used for the atlas features.
Returns the current feature number, where a value of 0 corresponds to the first feature.
Returns the current feature filename.
Returns whether the atlas generation is enabled.

Returns the file path for the current feature, based on a specified base file path and extension.

detaileddescription.para: This property has no effect is filterFeatures() is false.

Returns the calculated name for a specified atlas page number.
Returns the expression (or field name) used for calculating the page name.

element is the DOM node corresponding to the object.

briefdescription.para: Sets the coverage layer to use for the atlas features.
Sets whether the atlas is enabled.

If an invalid expression is passed, false will be returned and errorString will be set to the expression error.

briefdescription.para: Sets the expression used for filtering features in the coverage layer.

detaileddescription.para: This property has no effect is filterFeatures() is false.
If an invalid expression is passed, false will be returned and errorString will be set to the expression error.

briefdescription.para: Sets whether features should be filtered in the coverage layer.
Sets whether the coverage layer should be hidden in map items in the layouts.
Sets the expression (or field name) used for calculating the page name.
Sets whether features should be sorted in an ascending order.

detaileddescription.para: This property has no effect is sortFeatures() is false.

briefdescription.para: Sets the expression (or field name) to use for sorting features.

detaileddescription.para: This property has no effect is sortFeatures() is false.

detaileddescription.para: This property has no effect is sortFeatures() is false.

briefdescription.para: Returns the expression (or field name) to use for sorting features.

detaileddescription.para: This property has no effect is sortFeatures() is false.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if features should be sorted in the atlas.
Returns the object type as a string.

detaileddescription.para: This string must be a unique, single word, character only representation of the item type, eg "LayoutScaleBar"

briefdescription.para: Requeries the current atlas coverage layer and applies filtering and sorting.

detaileddescription.para:
The parentElement should refer to the parent layout's DOM element.

briefdescription.para: Seeks to the first feature, returning false if no feature was found.
Seeks to the last feature, returning false if no feature was found.
Iterates to the previous feature, returning false if no previous feature exists.

Is emitted when the atlas has an updated status bar message.
Emitted when the number of features for the atlas changes.

Emitted when atlas rendering has ended.
Emitted when atlas is enabled or disabled.

briefdescription.para: Class used to render QgsLayout as an atlas, by iterating over the features from an associated vector layer.

detaileddescription.para: QgsLayoutAtlas implement the QgsAbstractLayoutIterator interface, allowing them to be used directly with QgsLayoutExporter to automatically output all pages from the atlas.

For QgsPrintLayout layouts, it is not necessary to manually construct a QgsLayoutAtlas object. Instead, the atlas attached to the print layout should be used. This can be retrieved by calling QgsPrintLayout::atlas().
